name: Brick-Breaker 4Ever
description: Just a very simple brick breaker game that I had made for a programming class university. It's written using Unity in C# and features very basic functionality like endless levels and a high score that saves. This isn't anything new or exciting but is really my first foot in the door for games design and wanted to have it somewhere so I can look back on it. If anyone interested in the source code just let me know!
